title: Textile, 1952-166-43-a,b
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 4&1 satin damask. The background is the warp float face of the satin.
dimensions:
a. Warp: 91.5cm (36 in.) Weft: 54 cm (21 1/4in.) b. Warp:94.5 cm (37 1/4in). Weft:54cm (21 1/4in.) Both selvedges present in both pieces.
Pattern: both a and b required  for height of repeat.                               Height of repeat: 100cm (39 3/8in.)
description: Large flower in foliate scrolls with cornucopia-like shapes. Green.
